mdException.name: net.geoprism.registry.roles.CreateGeoObjectPermissionException
mdException.message: You do not have permissions to create a GeoObject of type [{geoObjectType}] in the organization [{organization}].

mdException.name: net.geoprism.registry.roles.WriteGeoObjectPermissionException
mdException.message: You do not have permissions to update a GeoObject of type [{geoObjectType}] in the organization [{organization}].

mdException.name: net.geoprism.registry.roles.DeleteGeoObjectPermissionException
mdException.message: You do not have permissions to delete a GeoObject of type [{geoObjectType}] in the organization [{organization}].

mdException.name: net.geoprism.registry.roles.ReadGeoObjectPermissionException
mdException.message: You do not have permissions to view a GeoObject of type [{geoObjectType}] in the organization [{organization}].

mdException.name: net.geoprism.registry.roles.HierarchyRelationshipPermissionException
mdException.message: You do not have permissions to modify the hierarchy for a parent GeoObject of type [{parentGeoObjectType}] and a child GeoObject of type [{childGeoObjectType}] in the organization [{organization}].
